inputFields.name: ROLLBACK_CMD
inputFields.description: Rollback command executes upon command failure

inputFields.name: CMD
inputFields.description: OS Command can contain Integra variables @{field} ${field}. Example: myscript --o1 @{id} --o2 ${name} --o3 @{uuid}. When executing OS commands use cmd.exe /c command. For example: cmd.exe /c echo hello. To treat strings with spaces as one unit enclose them in "

providerAction.name: deleteVirtualMachines
providerAction.description: Deletes one or more virtual machines

input.name: sessionInformation
input.description: Connection information and credentials for vmware

inputFields.name: vCenterUsername
inputFields.description: The username of the vCenter user

inputFields.name: vCenterPassword
inputFields.description: The password of the vCenter user

inputFields.name: vCenterHostname
inputFields.description: The ip or hostname of vCenter

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Regular expression for matching the names of the virtual machines to be deleted

outputFields.name: dsName
outputFields.description: The datastore where the virtual machine resides

outputFields.name: powerState
outputFields.description: Power state of the virtual machine

outputFields.name: type
outputFields.description: The Operating System type for virtual machine

outputFields.name: cpu
outputFields.description: Number of CPUs in the virtual machine

outputFields.name: memory
outputFields.description: Memory allocated to the virtual machine
